mapper.insert: insert into replylist(memail, pnum, rsubject, rcontent) values (#{memail}, #{pnum}, #{rsubject}, #{rcontent})
mapper.update: update replylist set rsubject = #{rsubject}, rcontent = #{rcontent}, modidate = now() where rnum = #{rnum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM replylist WHERE pnum = #{pnum}
